column1: NGR from 1950s record. The gauge was moved in 1921 100 yards East to this location and a drop of 50ft in elevation

Note on 1890s record states that in 1899 the gauge was out of order for part of the year but no readings are shown in brackets, and there is a line through the total and "bad" written in another hand; these readings have been removed
Dec 1896 and 1897 and annual totals are bracketed and have been removed.
Jan 1913 and Feb/Mar 1916 readings are bracketed; readings removed along with the annual totals
Sep 1921 and May 1930 readings are bracketed: readings removed along with annual totals

1933 four bracketed readings removed along with annual total. 1932 annual total is bracketed but no monthly readings are and the total matches the sum of the monthly readings; the 1932 annual total has been left in
June 1944 reading noted as being adjusted by engineer; reading left in. March 1947 reading is bracketed and has been removed along with the annual total
Jan 1956 readings is bracketed and has been removed along with the annual total
